entries.text: Salom! Mening ismim Jordan. Tanishganimdan xursandman.
entries.speaker: Jordan

entries.text: Salom Jordan! Men Minjiman. Men ham tanishganimdan xursandman.
entries.speaker: Minji

entries.text: Men kollej talabasiman. Men koreys tilini o'rganyapman.
entries.speaker: Jordan

entries.text: Voy, ajoyib! Koreys tili biroz qiyin, shunday emasmi?
entries.speaker: Minji

entries.text: Ha, qiyin, lekin qiziqarli. Iltimos, menga yordam bering.
entries.speaker: Jordan
